text: 11.26: 1 Pi 4.16Ana vov, maam Sor gangiap, ana kov taagiap Antiokan zɨgi. Ana Sorar kov, mani Antiokan zɨgap, mani maam mba Zisas zɨn vuav, ana zɨn panan ruagi gumgi gu mbigi, mani mbe phorga ki. Mani mbe phorga kav, mani gumgi gu mbigi vhɨrvera, mani Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuin mbe nzuav mbe khɨvigi. Mani maaŋ mbuav, mbe phorga kim, mpari mbave vhɨzgi. Mba tugen, Antiokan ki gumgi gu mbigi, mbe fhara guarara Zisas zɨn panan ruagi gumgi gu mbigi zɨ ndigi.
